source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_00<tab>The deftarm is trembling with equal parts excitement and fear.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_00<tab>聖フィネア連隊の露営地のウデキキは、武者震いしているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_01<tab>You and the deftarm have learned that your quarry has plotted a course for the Sea of Clouds in a manacutter commandeered from the Convictory. His anxiety about traveling to unfamiliar environs tempered the knowledge that you have friends among the Vanu Vanu who call this place home, your ever-enthusiastic pupil dashes off to hop aboard a kongamato. You can only hope that the deftarm's overeagerness will not be his downfall.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_01<tab>ウデキキは仮面の冒険者を追うため、ナッキ島へ向かった。アバラシア雲海のナッキ島にいる「ウデキキ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at Ok' Gundu Nakki to see that the deftarm has managed to get himself captured by Linu Vanu, who has mistaken the Vath for an atypical─but still appetizing─wamouracampa. The Vanu Vanu soon releases his quarry with a flurry of apologies, however, upon hearing that his would-be meal is in fact your fast friend and pupil. Linu Vanu can offer no news on the man you seek, but does share his concern that his sister Linu Vali has not returned since leaving the village to perfect a new dance. Concerned that she may come to harm if the masked marauder is roaming the area, you and the deftarm set out in search.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_02<tab>ウデキキと合流したところ、彼は群雲のリヌバヌにワモーラカンパと間違われて囚われていた。事情を話したところ、仮面の冒険者の目撃情報はなかったが、リヌバリが出かけたまま帰っていないらしく、探すことになった。アバラシア雲海のヴール・シアンシランで「リヌバリ」探そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_03<tab>You find Linu Vali, and are relieved to see that she has come to no harm, but was merely seeking inspiration for her new dance in the idyllic climes of Voor Sian Siran. She laments, however, that her new dance has not taken form quite as she hoped it would. Turning to you for inspiration, she asks that you perform for her a dance the likes of which neither her kind nor yours has ever seen. Might you perchance have some movements in your repertoire that would serve to stir her creative juices?
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_03<tab>リヌバリを見つけた。彼女も仮面の男は見ていないようで、新たな踊りを着想するため、冒険者は人のものではない「踊り」を見せるよう頼まれた。ヴール・シアンシランの「リヌバリ」に、人のものではない「踊り」をしよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_04<tab>You dance the dance of the moogles for Linu Vali, who is most taken with these endearing and unworldly undulations, joyfully proclaiming that she has found her long-sought inspiration. Unfamiliar with the importance of dance in Vanu Vanu culture, the deftarm is less than impressed, derisively insisting that flailing about will not avail you in the matter at hand: to wit, the pursuit of the masked villain you seek. Your pupil is quickly silenced when, against all odds, you spot a suspicious personage enjoying a leisurely bath in a nearby pool. The masked man introduces himself as Nhaza'a Jaab, and you soon surmise that this is none other than the ruthless villain behind Gullinbursti's sudden turn to madness. Your brave-if-foolhardy pupil steps forth to confront the masked Miqo'te and gleans some gainful information in the process: namely, that the man is in the service of an imperial agent, and possesses a firearm with the power to rob dragons and beastmen of their free will. The confrontation is brief, however, as the ruthless rogue treacherously disarms the deftarm. Wielding his weapon against a trio of unwitting Gundu warriors who arrive on the scene, he turns them against you and takes advantage of the ensuing chaos to make a discreet retreat. When Linu Vali's sundrop dance fails to subdue the ensorcelled Gundu, she asks you to join her in performing the dance she devised with your inspiration. The moonlift dance─as Linu Vali dubs it─shakes the very earth, and the Gundu return to their senses as they back away, ashamed at their actions. All present breathe a sigh of relief, although the deftarm is clearly disheartened that the dance he so mocked proved more powerful than did he. Perhaps a word from you might serve to lift your pupil's spirits.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_04<tab>リヌバリにエモート「モグモグダンス」をした。彼女は、新たな踊りの着想が湧き上がってきたという。そして、ウデキキが仮面の冒険者を見つけた。仮面の冒険者はナザ・ア・ジャーブという冒険者だった。彼は帝国の者からの依頼で、ドラゴン族に特殊な弾丸を撃ち込んで自我を奪ったという。ウデキキがナザ・ア・ジャーブと対峙していると、彼は現れたグンド族の雑兵たちを撃ち去っていった。自我を奪われた雑兵が襲ってきたが、冒険者とリヌバリの新たな舞「太陽と月の舞」で、見事に追い払うのだった。ヴール・シアンシランの「ウデキキ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_05<tab>The deftarm is discouraged, but undeterred, and together you resolve to continue the search for your dangerous and elusive quarry. In the meantime, Linu Vali invites you and your friends to return to Ok' Gundu Nakki, where she would report back to Linu Vanu on recent developments.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_05<tab>ウデキキと話した。とりあえず、ナッキ島に戻ることになった。ナッキ島の「ウデキキ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_06<tab>Back in Ok' Gundu Nakki, you are rejoined by Master Mogzin and Ohl Deeh, who lament that while they were able to track down Gullinbursti, he soon flew off in a rage, doubtless summoned by the master that Nhaza'a Jaab serves. You, the deftarm, and Ohl Deeh resolve to pursue him northeast to Azys Lla, but not all of your friends will be following you. For while Linu Vali desires to join you, she is forbidden by Vanu tradition from setting foot in that baneful land. Meanwhile, Master Mogzin seems to have suffered a sudden crisis of confidence, insisting that he has naught to offer you in the battle to come. Ignoring the heated pleas of the deftarm and Ohl Deeh, he shrinks off back to Moghome with his tail between his legs...
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_SEQ_06<tab>ウデキキと話したところ、グリンブルスティを追っていたモグジンとオル・ディーが合流した。そして、グリンブルスティが飛んでいったという、魔大陸アジス・ラーへ向かうことになった。リヌバリは、禁忌の土地のため同行できないという。さらに、モグジンが役に立てないからと、去ってしまった。ウデキキとオル・ディーは、そのことに憤慨しているようだ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with the deftarm at Ok' Gundu Nakki.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_00<tab>ナッキ島でウデキキと合流

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_01<tab>Search for Linu Vali at Voor Sian Siran.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_01<tab>ヴール・シアンシランでリヌバリを探す

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_02<tab>Perform for Linu Vali a /dance she has never seen.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_02<tab>リヌバリに人のものではない「踊り」をする

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the deftarm.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_03<tab>ウデキキと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the deftarm at Ok' Gundu Nakki.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TODO_04<tab>ナッキ島のウデキキと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_JANTELLOT_000_000<tab>Were it me, I'd want nothing to do with that man, but I suppose adventurers like yourself do not have the same luxury. I know that you are more than capable of holding your own on the field of battle─to say the least─but still...do be careful out there.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_JANTELLOT_000_000冒険者ってのも大変だな。
本当に「仮面の冒険者」は半端ない強さだったぜ。
まあ、お前がついてりゃ平気だろうが、せいぜい油断するなよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_STORYTELLER_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_STORYTELLER_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TARRESSON_000_002<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_TARRESSON_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_005<tab><click> <click> What say you, Master? Reaching the Sea of Clouds is as simple as traveling northeast and hopping on the back of a kongamato, but wherever should we go from there? Is there anyone in that distant land that might aid us in our quest?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_005シシシシシ……アバラシア雲海へ向かうには、
ここから北東へ、コンガマトーに乗って飛んでいけばいいんだね。
でも、どこで情報を集めることにしよう？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_006<tab>The...Vanu Vanu? Of the island of Ok' Gundu...Nakki? These names and sounds are unfamiliar to me. To have won the trust and friendship of a tribe I have not so much as heard of, let alone seen! Once again I am beside myself with admiration, Master.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_006バヌバヌ族が住むナッキ島？
さすがは師匠だ、いろんな種族と仲がいいんだな。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_007<tab>As your devoted pupil, I am eager to earn their trust as well. To the Sea of Clouds, Master! I shall race you there!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_007アバラシア雲海に入ってすぐの小さな浮島だね。
じゃあ、今度はオイラのコンガマトーと、
「ナッキ島」まで競争だ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> returns to us as warm spring breeze after long winter. And you could not have come at a better time! For <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((tonight)) ((today)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((tonight)) /var>)) /var> we shall feast!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_009これは、これは、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
我が妹リヌバリは出かけているが、
ちょうど、いいところに来た。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_010<tab><click> <click> Master! You must save me! I had just arrived on these shores when these monstrous bird creatures captured me! I think they mean to eat me!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_010シシシシシ……師匠、助けてくれ！
ここに着いた途端、急に捕らえられたんだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_011<tab>You honor us with your return, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We will celebrate your arrival with a great feast. Look here! Funny wamouracampa stumbles into our trap like clumsy paissa falling into sinkhole.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_011これは、これは、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
落とし穴に嵌るパイッサのように、いいところに来た。
ちょうど、珍しいワモーラカンパを捕らえたところだぞ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_012<tab>A strange one it is, but surely tasty. Bring shell-cracker! Linu Vanu shall knead its meat into his specialty catsfoot chew!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_012どんな味がするのかわからんが、
さっそく、さっそく、草団子にして味わおうではないか。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_013<tab>Your pupil, you say!? Oh, forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Linu Vanu owes you apologies as innumerable as the stars in the night sky! Release the netherling's bite-sized friend at once.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_013なんと、なんと、)) (( )) 02 /var>の弟子とは！
それは、夜中のゲイラキャットのように失礼した。
今すぐ拘束を解こう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_014<tab>...I see. Linu Vanu shares your struggle and your pain, and wishes he could be of aid, but such a person is not known to Linu Vanu or the Gundu. Deeply sorry is Linu Vanu.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_014なるほど、なるほど、事情はわかった。
しかし、「仮面の冒険者」らしきヒトは、
村の者も見かけてはいないようだ……力になれなくてすまぬ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_015<tab>It is with shame and heavy heart that Linu Vanu speaks of his own worries, but Linu Vanu fears for his sister. Linu Vali departs Ok' Gundu Nakki in search of ideas for new dance. Linu Vanu waits and waits, but she does not return. Linu Vanu fears storm clouds are brewing...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_015そういえば、そういえば、我が妹リヌバリが、
新たな舞を創作すると、どこかへ出かけたままだった。
その話を聞いて、暗雲が立ち込めるように心配になってきたぞ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_017<tab><click> <click> Master! If the masked man is behind this, this Linu Vali may be in grave danger! Very grave! We should go quickly, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_017シシシシシ……リヌバリってヤツは強いのか？
そうじゃないなら、危ないから探そうよ。
「仮面の冒険者」も見つかるかもしれないしね。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_018<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and apprentice are like shining sun to chase away the clouds of Linu Vanu's anxious heart. If Linu Vanu knows his sister, you are like to find her in Voor Sian Siran. Go in safety, my friends.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_018それは、それは、大助かりだ。
手分けして「リヌバリ」を探すことにしよう。
お主たちは、妹が好むヴール・シアンシランの方を頼む。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_019<tab><click> <click> Thank you for saving me, Master. I am unfamiliar with this “catsfoot chew,” but I would prefer not to be chewed up all the same. I must say, I find these Vanu Vanu somewhat intimidating. Anyhow, let us be off to Voor...whatever it was.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_019危うく食われるところだったよ。
バヌバヌ族って、デカくてちょっと……怖いな。
さあ、ヴール・シアンシランというところに向かおうぜ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_025<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and apprentice are too kind to assist Linu Vanu in search for Linu Vali. Go in safety to Voor Sian Siran, and please tell your friend that he need not worry about being eaten...at least not by Linu Vanu.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_025手分けして「リヌバリ」を探すことにしよう。
お主たちは、妹が好むヴール・シアンシランの方を頼む。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_030<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Your presence is ever like a gentle breeze on a summer's day. Whatever brings you back to the home of the Vanu Vanu?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_030どうも、どうも、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
こんなところまで、いったい何の用事かしら？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_031<tab>Oh, but if that isn't the most succulent-looking wamouracampa Linu Vali has ever seen!
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_031<tab>まあ、まあ、おいしそうなワモーラカンパ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_032<tab>H-How many times must I say it!? I am not a wamoura-anything, and I am most certainly <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to be eaten! I am the Vath deftarm, and I am an adventurer! Please tell her, Master!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_032シシシシシ……違うよ！
オイラは、冒険者のウデキキだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_033<tab>A thousand pardons, friend Deftarm! Linu Vali's nose was deceived by your most inviting aroma. Do not worry, you are safe with Linu Vali. That said, I fear I have seen and heard nothing of this masked man of whom you speak.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_033なるほどね、なるほどね、そういうことだったの。
「仮面の冒険者」ですか……ごめんなさい。
それらしきヒトは見かけてないわ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_034<tab>Linu Vali did not mean to cause Brother to worry. Linu Vali simply came here to practice her new dance. Linu Vali would show it to you, but she fears that there is not much yet to be worthy of showing...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_034ところで、ところで、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
私は新たな舞を考えていたのだけれど、
まだ、何かが足りない気がするの……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_035<tab>...But of course! Surely you have encountered a new dance in your travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? A dance unlike any seen by Gundu or your kind? If you know such a dance, pray show it to Linu Vali, that it might be as a lightning bolt of inspiration!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_035もしかして、もしかして、貴方の新たな舞を見れば、
大地を潤す湧水のように、着想が湧いてくるかもしれません。
それも、ヒトのものではない「踊り」を見せてくれませんか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_038<tab>Surely you have encountered a new dance in your travels, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? A dance unlike any seen by Gundu or your kind? If you know such a dance, pray show it to Linu Vali, that it might be as a lightning bolt of inspiration!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_038もしかして、もしかして、貴方の新たな舞を見れば、
大地を潤す湧水のように、着想が湧いてくるかもしれません。
それも、ヒトのものではない「踊り」を見せてくれませんか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_039<tab><click> <click> <var 1A 02 /var>Dancing<var 1A 01 /var>? I do not mean to doubt you, Master, but surely there are more important matters that demand our attention.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_039シシシシシ……師匠、何してるんだ？
早く「仮面の冒険者」を探そうよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_040<tab>No...no, those motions do not move Linu Vali. Surely you have seen a more...<var 1A 02 /var>exotic<var 1A 01 /var> dance? One the likes of which no Gundu has ever seen?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_040……いまいち、いまいち、着想が湧きません。
どうか、ヒトのものではない「踊り」を見せてくれませんか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_041<tab>Yes...yes! Vigor and vitality wells up from within Linu Vali like a fount gushing skyward from the earth! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the bolt of inspiration I have so long sought! With this, Linu Vali will create a dance that will go down in Gundu history!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_041なんと、なんと！
膨れ上がった綿雲のように、生命力溢れる素晴らしい舞！
着想が湧き上がってきました、新たな舞を完成できそうです！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_042<tab><click> <click> What is it with this dancing!? And you, Master! Forget these overgrown birds─I would have thought <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> of all people would understand the seriousness of our task! We are never going to find that masked man bouncing around like fools!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_042シシシシシ……いい加減にしてくれ！
師匠まで何だよ、踊っている場合じゃないだろ？
遊んでないで、早く「仮面の冒険者」を探そうよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_043<tab>A thousand pardons, friend. Neither <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> nor Linu Vali meant to offend. We sympathize with your plight, but pray understand: to we Vanu, dance is not foolishness, oh no! It is an act as sacred as life and death. If it does not help you in your quest, Linu Vali is sorry, and yet...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_043ごめんなさい、ごめんなさい、
でも、私たちバヌバヌ族にとって、踊りは神聖なもの。
断じて、ただの遊びじゃないんです。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_044<tab><click> <click> Shhh! Master, over there! I cannot believe I am saying this, but if my eyes see true, that is...!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_044シシシシシ……ん、ちょっとまって……。
あそこに誰かいる……なんだか、妙な顔をしているな……。
そうか、ヤツが「仮面の冒険者」……やっと見つけたぞ！！

source:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_045 I knew it! It's him!
You there! Who are you, and what have you done to Gullinbursti!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_045シシシシシ……ドラゴン族を銃で撃って、
おかしくさせたのはお前だな！？
いったい、何をしたんだ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384__NHAZAAJAAB_000_046<tab>(-Menacing Miqo'te-)Hmph... Can a man not enjoy a bath in peace?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384__NHAZAAJAAB_000_046(-仮面の冒険者-)フゥ……人が水浴びしているところに押しかけるとは……
下衆の極みだな。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384__NHAZAAJAAB_000_047<tab>(-Menacing Miqo'te-)Then again, I know better than to expect common courtesy from beastman brutes. Even those who are wont to travel with more...civilized types.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384__NHAZAAJAAB_000_047(-仮面の冒険者-)まあ、蛮族に礼儀を求めるのも無理があるか。
人も混ざっているみたいだが……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_048<tab>An adventurer, are we? One would think you'd have learned to keep better company. And to keep a wide berth of Nhaza'a Jaab, the Ebon Claw. But you'll learn soon enough, won't you? Oh yes, you will...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_048どうやら冒険者のようだな。
蛮族とつるむとは、おかしなヤツだ……。
邪魔立ては、この俺が「ナザ・ア・ジャーブ」と知ってのことか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_049<tab>Well, well! Now <var 1A 02 /var>there's<var 1A 01 /var> a face I never thought I'd see again. Though I suppose you would say the same of Nhaza'a Jaab...wouldn't you, <var 1A 02 /var>old friend<var 1A 01 /var>? Mayhap you've come to thrill and delight me? For old times' sake?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_049お前は……ザナラーンでも蛮族とつるんでいた冒険者だな？
あのときは、さすがの俺も死ぬかと思ったが、この通り生き延びた。
お前が関わっているとは……また「熱狂」させてくれるのか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_050<tab>I asked you a question, vile rogue! What did you do to the dragon Gullinbursti!? You will give me an answer, or...or I, the deftarm, will beat one out of you!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_050オイラの質問に答えろ、仮面野郎！
いったい、ドラゴン族に何をしたんだ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_051<tab>Heh heh heh...a brute and a beast you may be, but you have spirit. If you did not repulse me so, I might almost like you. Here is your answer: I did my job...and nothing more.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_051フッ……俺は依頼をこなしただけだ。
ドラヴァニア雲海で強力なドラゴン族を探して、
そいつに特殊な「弾丸」を撃ち込むという依頼をな……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_052<tab>A simple task: to scour the Churning Mists for a mighty dragon, and pierce his scales with a single bullet. A bullet that would warp his mind and twist his heart, destroying any semblance of the noble creature he once was, until all that remained was a brute consumed with pure, <var 1A 02 /var>animal<var 1A 01 /var> rage. A beautiful thing, is it not?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_052その「弾丸」はドラゴン族の自我を奪って凶暴化させるらしい。
人以上の長寿と頭脳を誇るドラゴン族も、一発で野獣に成り下がる。
……なかなか面白いオモチャだと思わんか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_053<tab>Wh-What...what madness is this!? The hearts of others are not yours to control!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_053じ、自我を奪うなんて……
そんなこと、このオイラが許さないぞ！！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_054<tab>Curious words coming from one of <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> kind. Go back to your hive, Gnath. You were never meant to possess a mind of your own.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_054お前はグナース族のようだが、
こんなところにいるとは、群れからはぐれたのか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_055<tab><click> <click> Y-You know nothing of me! I am the Vath deftarm─an adventurer just like the master who trained me! I have tracked you, I have found you, and I will see you answer for your deeds!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_055シシシシシ……オイラは冒険者のウデキキだ！
依頼を受けてお前を追ってきた！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_056<tab>Hmmmmmm? Hah...hah...bwahahahahahahahahaha! Oh, but my ears must be playing tricks on me! For a moment there, I thought I heard the witless antling say he was an <var 1A 02 /var>adventurer<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_056フフフ……フハハハハハハハハハ！
こいつは面白い！　蛮族の冒険者ときたか！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_057<tab>S-Silence! I am more of an adventurer than you will ever be! Now answer me! What master do you serve, and what does he mean to do with Gullinbursti!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_057何がおかしい！
お前の依頼人の目的は何なんだ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_058<tab>I “serve” some imperial lackwit whose name I could not be bothered to remember. A fool's coin is worth as much as any man's, you see, and they tend to part with it more easily than most. Now, would you mind lowering your weapon? As you can see, I am unarmed...though I suppose I should know better than to expect decency from an animal.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_058フフフ……さあな、依頼人は帝国の下衆野郎とだけ言っておこう。
あとは報酬をもらえば、そいつも用はないがな……。
ところで、蛮族の冒険者は丸腰の相手を撃つのか？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_059<tab><click> <click> The deftarm is no...animal.
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_059<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_060<tab>...All too easy. Didn't your master teach you not to trust me?
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_060<tab>さあ、どうする冒険者？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_061<tab><click> <click> You...you do not fight with honor!
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_061<tab>シシシシシ……く、くそう！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_062<tab>You're a quick learner...though not quick enough, I'm afraid. Now, we know what this can do to a dragon... I wonder what it might do to a Gnath?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_062この銃に込められた特殊な「弾丸」が、
グナース族にも効くことは、わかっている……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_063<tab>Or a Vanu Vanu, or even... Oh, <var 1A 02 /var>yes<var 1A 01 /var>...!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_063バヌバヌ族はどうかな……？
それとも……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_064<tab>N-No! Leave my friends alone, or I...I will rend the flesh from your bones!
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_064<tab>や、やめてくれー！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_065<tab>Ahahahahaha! Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>yesss<var 1A 01 /var>! Let me taste your fear and your hatred! Your rage and despair! Despise me! Abhor me! <var 1A 02 /var>Delight<var 1A 01 /var> me!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_065フハハハハハ……いいぞ、そうだ！
その絶望の嘶きを、もっともっと聞かせてくれ！
それこそ、俺が求める狂おしいほどの興奮……「熱狂」へと誘う！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_067<tab>(-Gundu Warrior-)Who goes there!? Who dares intrude on Gundu lands!?
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_067<tab>(-グンド族の雑兵-)なんだ、なんだ、我らの領地で何をしている！？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_068<tab>...And just when I was starting to get in the mood. But perhaps we might enjoy ourselves another way...?
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_068<tab>チッ、邪魔が入ったか……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_069<tab>(-Gundu Warrior-)M-My...my head... M-My body... My arms...they...ngggaaaAAAHHHHHH!!!
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_069<tab>(-グンド族の雑兵-)うう……うぐぐぐ……うがぁぁぁぁー！！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_070<tab>Oh dear...it seems your friends aren't so friendly anymore. Well, do have fun killing each other. There's somewhere I must be.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_NHAZAAJAAB_000_070バヌバヌ族にも効くようだな……。
悔しければそいつらを倒して追ってこい！
その滾る憎悪こそが、我が魂を震わせる「熱狂」たりえるのだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_071<tab>Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Join Linu Vali, and together we will dance them away!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_071)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
ここは、ここは、私と太陽の舞で撃退しましょう！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_072<tab>The sundrop dance does not reach them! Linu Vali knows not if she is ready, but there is no other way. Watch, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Watch and move with Linu Vali!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_072ダメよ、ダメよ、効かないわ！
こうなったら、新たな舞を試してみましょう！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、私に合わせて踊ってください！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_073<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_073<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_074<tab>(-Gundu Warrior-)Wh-What...what madness has taken us!? F-Forgive us, Linu Vali! We meant no harm!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_ZOUHYOUVANU02384_000_074(-グンド族の雑兵-)ヒィッ！
なんと、なんと、真夏の太陽よりもまぶしい舞なのだ！
こんな舞は……ついぞ見たことがない！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_075<tab>Linu Vali knew she could count on <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Even without practice, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s motions match Linu Vali in perfect harmony, like we are <var 08 E905 ((sisters)) ((brother and sister)) /var> from the same nest.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_075さすがは、さすがは、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
練習もなしに、ぴったり合わせてくれるだなんて、
まるで同じ巣で生まれたのよう！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_076<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Linu Vali─netherling and Gundu─dance as one. Different beings we are, but together we lift each other to new heights, and shine radiant light through the darkness. In honor of this, Linu Vali would name her new dance <var 1A 02 /var>moonlift dance<var 1A 01 /var>. A fine name, would you agree?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_076今まさに、太陽と月が同時に輝いたかのような舞が完成しました！
「太陽と月の舞」と名付けましょう！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_077<tab><click> <click> I mocked you, but your dance has proved stronger than I could ever be. When confronted with my greatest challenge yet, it is I who made a mockery of myself...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_077シシシシシ……踊りには凄い効果があるんだね。
遊びだなんて言ってごめん。
オイラ、何もできなかったよ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_080<tab>Thanks to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, moonlift dance is now complete, and is a shining success. When the storm has passed, we will hold a great celebration at Ok' Gundu Nakki, and together we will dance.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_080)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげで、
「太陽と月の舞」が完成しました。
近いうちに、舞の完成を祝う宴を開きたいものです。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_090<tab><click> <click> F-Forgive me, Master... For all you have taught me, I could do nothing against our foe. And he has eluded us again. Whatever shall we do?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_090シシシシシ……オイラ、何もできなかったけど、
自我を奪うようなヤツは、絶対に許すことはできない！
でも、仮面野郎を取り逃がしちまった、これからどうしよう？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_091<tab>Do not lose heart, friend. For now, let us return to Ok' Gundu Nakki. Brother is surely worried for us, and Linu Vali would put his heart at ease.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_091とりあえず、とりあえず、
兄も心配していると思いますので、「ナッキ島」へ戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_095<tab>Linu Vali told Brother all about our encounter with the masked man, and how Linu Vali and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> chased the threat away. Brother is eager to see our moonlift dance with his own eyes.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_095兄には、兄には、私から報告しておきました。
「太陽と月の舞」を、お披露目するのが楽しみです。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_096<tab>A thousand thank-yous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not only have you rescued Linu Vali from grave danger, you have joined in the creation of a dance that will go down in Gundu history. Your presence is like an ever-steady sunbeam shining through the trees to warm our feathers.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVANU_000_096ありがとう、ありがとう、妹が無事で一安心だ。
そのうえ、新たな舞の完成に一役買ってくれたとかで、
樹下に降り注ぐ木漏れ日のように感謝する。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_100<tab><click> <click> Wherever shall we go now, Master? Shall we go after that masked man? Perhaps we might begin by tracking down the master he serves...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_100シシシシシ……これからどうやって、仮面野郎を探そう？
テイコクの下衆野郎に報酬をもらうとか言ってたから、
そいつを探すことにしようか……？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_101<tab>Or perhaps we should return to Moghome, and share what we have learned with Master Mogzin? Doubtless he is eager to know...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_101それとも、グリンブルスティに起きたことは突き止めたから、
ひとまず、モグジンに報告したほうがいいのかな……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_102<tab>(-???-)Kupopo! Did somebody call?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_102(-？？？？-)くぽぽー！
それは、ちょうどよかったくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_103<tab>Well, look what we have here! A cuddly little gaelicat and a fledgling chick! Have you wandered from your nest to join Linu Vali and her friends in dancing our new dance?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_103あら、あら、可愛らしいゲイラキャットと雛鳥だこと。
村に迷い込むだなんて、舞の完成を祝福してくれてるのかしら？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_104<tab>Cat!? Who are you calling a cat!? I am Master Mogzin of the Mogmenders, the renowned guild of craftsmoogles that repaired the ancient plaza of Bahrr Lehs. Perhaps you have heard of us, kupo?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_104ニャー！？
モグは猫じゃないくぽ！
ドラヴァニア雲海から来た、モーグリ族のモグジンくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_105<tab>And I am no fledgling! Do you not see these resplendent scales? I am Ohl Deeh, a mighty and powerful dragon! Cower in my wake!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_105て、てやんでい！
雛鳥とは聞き捨てならねぇな！
俺っちは、誇り高きドラゴン族のオル・ディーでい！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_106<tab>And just what are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> supposed to be? Why, I have never seen such a portly, pudgy bird in my life!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_106オメェこそ、なんだってんでぃ？
こんな丸々太った鳥、見たこともないぜぃ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_107<tab>You do me too great an honor with your words, friend. My cheeks turn as red as a fiery sunset. I am Linu Vali of the Gundu, and I bid you welcome to Ok' Gundu Nakki.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_107そんな、そんな、褒めないでください。
恥ずかしくて、夕日のように赤くなってしまいます。
私は、バヌバヌ族のリヌバリです、我が村へようこそ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_108<tab><click> <click> I do not think he meant that as a...never mind. Master Mogzin, Ohl Deeh─what brings you to this place?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_108シシシシシ……モグジンとオル・ディー、
何でこんなところにいるんだ？

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_109<tab>We traveled far and wide, over mountains and across the skies, in pursuit of Gullinbursti! Our journey took us here, but just when we thought we had him, he evaded our paws, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_109グリンブルスティさんを追っていたら、
いつのまにか、このアバラシア雲海に着いたくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_110<tab>We may have lost him, but we have now found you! I daresay today is not a total loss.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_110そうでい、そうでい、
そんでもって、グリンブルスティのダンナを見失っちまって、
途方にくれていたところに、オメェらを見かけたんでぃ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_111<tab>Speaking of which, how did you and your pupil fare in your search for the masked man? Were you able to learn the truth of what he did to Gullinbursti?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_111そちらは、仮面の男を見つけたみたいくぽ。
さっそく、報告してほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_112<tab>A weapon that can twist and warp the hearts of dragons and beasts!? What a positively frightful proposition! The mere thought of it makes the fur on my back stand on end, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_112くぽぽ……。
仮面の男は、そんなに恐ろしいヤツだったくぽ。
自我を奪うなんて……ヒド過ぎるくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_113<tab>We did catch up with Gullinbursti, but he was even less receptive to our words than before. He only let out a mighty roar, then soared off to the northeastern skies in a rage. It was almost as if something were <var 1A 02 /var>calling<var 1A 01 /var> him there. As much as it pains me to say it, I fear he may be gone for good, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_113グリンブルスティさんは、モグたちの呼びかけにも答えず、
引き寄せられるかのように、北東の空へ飛んでいったくぽ。
もしかしたら……もう、元には戻らないかもくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_114<tab>P-Preposterous! Gullinbursti was as kind and noble a dragon as I have ever known! Surely there is a way to reach him and restore him to his senses!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_114てやんでい、べらぼうめぇ！
そ、そんなわけ……あってたまるかいっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_115<tab><click> <click> I must agree with Ohl Deeh. I saw it with my own eyes, I did. When Master and Linu Vali danced together, the rage of the mad Gundu was quick to subside.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_115いや、きっと戻るさ。
自我を奪われたバヌバヌ族は、正気に戻ったんだ。
何かのきっかけさえあれば、きっと元に戻るはずだよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_116<tab>Yes, Linu Vali swears this is true. As dance can reach the heart of us Vanu Vanu, surely there is a way to call out to your dragon friend, too!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_116そうよ、そうよ、バヌバヌ族には舞が有効だったから、
ドラゴン族にも、何かきっかけとなるものがあるはずだわ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_117<tab><click> <click> That's right! I know not yet what it might be, but we must try! Gullinbursti has clearly been summoned to some strange land by that masked man's vile master. We must set out to the northeast, and hurry to his side!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_117シシシシシ……さあ、そうとわかれば、
グリンブルスティが消えた北東へ、みんなで探しにいこう！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_118<tab>...Wait, friend. You do know what lies northeast of here, yes? It is Azys Lla, the land of nightmares where all Vanu are forbidden to tread.
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_118……雲海の北東といえば、語ることさえ禁じられた、
それは、それは、おぞましい禁忌の地「魔大陸」がある場所よ。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_119<tab>It is with great shame that Linu Vali says she can accompany you no further. And after all <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has done for Linu Vali...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_LINUVALI_000_119ごめんなさい、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんには、
大きな恩があるから、協力したいところだけど……
私たちバヌバヌ族は、「魔大陸」に立ち入ることができないの。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_120<tab>Think nothing of it. Nothing at all! This was a task for Master and I from the beginning, and Master and I will see it done. Is that not right, Master?
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_120それならしょうがないよ。
もともと、巻き込んじゃったわけだからね。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_121<tab>Such powerful words, kupo! I have the utmost confidence in you. A-And with that...I do believe I'll be heading back to Moghome. My hammer is made for crafting, not fighting, after all...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_121悪いけど、モグもここで帰るくぽ。
そんな危険な場所なら、きっと戦う羽目になるくぽ。
モグは職人だから、戦えなくて役に立たないくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_122<tab><click> <click> You are going <var 1A 02 /var>home<var 1A 01 /var>!? What foolishness is this!? You care for your friend Gullinbursti, do you not!? Surely there is some way you could be of service without fighting! Any way at all!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_122シシシシシ……なんだよそれ！
グリンブルスティは大事な仲間なんだろ！？
戦わなくても、何か手伝ってくれてもいいじゃないか！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_123<tab>That's right, Mogzin! I thought you were a friend to dragons! To Gullinbursti, and to me!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_OHLDEEH_000_123なんでい、なんでい、見損なったぜモグジン！
それでも、俺っちのダチかよぉ！

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_124<tab>I...I am sorry. But you will be better off without me. You must...believe me, kupo...
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_MOGZIN_000_124ごめんくぽ……。
みんな、グリンブルスティさんのことは頼んだくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_125<tab>Does that moogle have no shame!? It would seem I was right about him after all! He is a lazy do-nothing! A slacker, and nothing more!
target:
TEXT_BANALL130_02384_UDEKIKI_000_125なんてヤツだ！
やっぱり、遊んでるだけの、ふざけた野郎だ！
